Government agencies.Description: The Department of Energy regulates energy production, distribution, and usage in the United States.
The Environmental Protection Agency enforces regulations related to environmental protection and sustainability.
The Federal Communications Commission oversees the regulation of communication services and infrastructure.
The National Institutes of Health funds research related to health and medical advancements.
